Data.oldValue: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_PaySelectionLine WHERE C_PaySelectionLine.C_Invoice_ID=C_AllocationLine.C_Invoice_ID AND C_PaySelection_ID = @C_PaySelection_ID@)

PO.Data: EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM C_AllocationHdr ah INNER JOIN C_AllocationLine al ON(al.C_AllocationHdr_ID = ah.C_AllocationHdr_ID) INNER JOIN C_PaySelectionLine psl ON(psl.C_invoice_ID = al.C_Invoice_ID) WHERE C_AllocationLine.C_AllocationHdr_ID = ah.C_AllocationHdr_ID AND psl.C_PaySelection_ID = @C_PaySelection_ID@)
